titleStmt.title: An Account of a most barbarous and bloody murthre, committed yesterday in Covent-Garden, by Mr. Parry who belong to the play-house on the body of Mr. Henry Arthur, who was lately try'd for robbing the Western Maile.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas White, near Fleet Street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
